name: Kill the Stickman (itch) (Mycah)
description:
this was an old game I made back when i was 11-12 years old using the wick editor :D

you can use "Kill The Stickman.wick" and open it on the wick editor to made mods ;)

for some reason, old me switched the pause and resume button XD

(i don't have a logo for this game so i used my name logo)
